name: Krampus is Coming To Town
description:
WARNING: This game contains content that children under 10 may find frightening and disturbing. This includes: disturbing imagery, insinuating children are being harmed, creepy monsters, violence, flashing lights, and abrupt noises.

While taking shelter in your family's winter cabin from a blizzard, you dig up a DVD set of an old Christmas children's TV show,  Krampus Is Coming To Town.

But you don’t recall the show being so interactive…. or knowing who you are.

Krampus is Coming To Town is a Visual Novel where you play as an unnamed MC. While taking shelter in your family's winter cabin from a blizzard, you dig up a DVD set of an old Christmas children's TV show, Krampus Is Coming To Town. The DVD set stars two disobedient children as they learn time and time again what happens if they act naughty before Christmas Day. As you prepare to bunker down, you start the first DVD for nostalgia's sake. 


Creative Director: Oishii

Writers: Lila, Asclepius

Beta testers: Lila, Asclepius

"Hacked" and its author "David Libeau"
